autocomplete.fail: > Oops! Something went wrong while trying to run this command. Please try again.

button.fail: > Oops! We encountered an error while processing this button. Please try again.

modal.fail: > Oops! We encountered an error while processing this button. Please try again.

command.fail: > Oops! There was an error executing this command. Please try again later.
command.devOnly: > Sorry! This command is reserved for the developer of {{client}}. Please contact them for assistance.
command.underDev: > Heads up! This bot is currently under development. Please check back later.
command.userPremium: > Sorry! This command is only available to premium users. Consider upgrading your access.
command.userPremiumEnd: > Your premium access has expired <t:{{duration}}:R>. Please renew your subscription to use premium commands.
command.guildPremium: > Sorry! This command can only be used in a premium server. Please check your server's status.
command.guildPremiumEnd: > This server's premium access has expired <t:{{duration}}:R>. Please renew the server's premium status to use premium commands.
